name: Vidella Hotel

reviews.text: Visited this hotel for first time, while catching up with friends in North, Blackpool not my first choice of place to visit, but friends choose location. Hotel was ok, staff great, loved the dog, John one of the day staff, sorted out my international newspapers without any problem. Good value for my dollars.
reviews.title: Great value for money

reviews.text: Diane, Debbie and Elizabeth had a wonderful time in the hotel............great to stay withstaff who have great sense of humor, also who want to please and make your stay nice. Breakfast was really nice, we stayed on for Sunday lunch which was fab, bit gutted we never ate in the resturant, will do next time. Love it xxxx cant wait for the next trip Watch out Bendan ha xxxx
reviews.title: Fabulous

reviews.text: This hotel is the best i have ever stayed in in Blackpool, or anywhere. The rooms are very good, the food is sublime, and the staff are wonderfull, nothing is too much trouble. They are also a great form of entertainment.......I wish i was back there already. It is also very central...........beware the cocktails though.....hahahaha
reviews.title: simply the best,

reviews.text: On arriving Friday tea time me friend and i was made to feel like a old friend returning, once booked in we went to our room (only complaint was the ten pound deposit for the remote control for the tv) the room was lovely and clean and whilst the bathroom may not have been the biggiest it was spotless. The bar area is lovely and having viewed the menu we thought we would ask if we could have room service( a lot of places wont do this anymore) and it was no problem, so a few drinks later we ordered the food and WOW i cannot remember the last time i had food of such high quality, and my freind i was with is the fussiest eater going but he loved it, so much so we had room service again the night after and even recommened the food to people viewing the menu outside the hotel. If your unfortunate enough not to be able to book a room just get a table booked in the restaurant, cause if you dont like it id eat my hat, so thanks to Neil, John and the staff, this is now going to be a regular visit, jon and kev from manchester
reviews.title: Awesome, from walking through the door to leaving 2 days later!!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel is in a good location, nice quiet street, only a block or so from the seafront. Very clean. Friendly staff and good breakfast. Our room was quite big, big enough to fit a sofa in aswell as the bed! If you've stayed in many Blackpool hotels you'll know that most of them are just big enough for the bed and not much else but this was quite spacious.
reviews.title: Probably the best hotel I've stayed in, in Blackpool..

reviews.text: Stayed as part of a large football group. Hotel was pretty average. Would have been ok but the fire alarm was set off at 4am in the morning and it took 45 minutes for a hotel staff member to even get on the scene, which quite frankly is not acceptable. Other than that, the rooms were fine, but the ensuite was tiny, even for a thin person! Good help anyone old or overweight person! Breakfast was fairly good considering but I woudnt choose to stay here again
reviews.title: Typical blackpool b and b

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I have just returned from a weekend in blackpool yesterday and i stayed the vidella and all i can say is wow, The service in this place is second to none and the food is to die for , guaranteed 24 hr service with a smile, Rooms were also of a high standard with towels and bed linen being changed every couple of days unlike some of the places i have stayed at where they change the sheets once a week
reviews.title: FANTASTIC HOTEL WITH SUPERB STAFF AND TOP QUALITY SERVICE WOULD RATE IT 10 STARS IF I COULD

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I would like to take the opportunity to thank Neil, John and Greg for the kind hearted service and the heartfelt friendship that was felt during my stay at the Vidella and if i worked for any hotel company i would rate it a 20 star , Keep up the Good Work Guys .
reviews.title: excellent stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: hi all
reviews.title: HORRIFIC

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: brill place to stay, warm freindly greeting, staff ace john and neil the owners give u good food and good cocktails. and even join you for a drink in the eve time, greg the waiter funny. would deffo go back there could'nt go wrong
reviews.title: my stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed here with my wife valentines weekend wedding anniversary break had a great stay the guys were great thank you for a really nice weekend couldnt fault it.Very clean nice decor comfortable bed friendly hotel great value best stay in Blackpool.
reviews.title: Valentines Weekend Stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Thank You.
reviews.title: Nothing like website pictures!! Do not be Decieved!

reviews.text: The website and pictures are a complete lie, especially the rooms -
reviews.title: Disapointed 2/10 would no recommend .. picks on website are deceiving!!

reviews.text: Very dated, tiny, dirty, stains all over, and the ceiling looked as though it was going to
reviews.title: excellent hotel

reviews.text: fall through any minute. The bathroom was also very small and not very clean.. From the outside the hotel looks ok, but as soon as you start walking through the corridors to the rooms its obvious the decor hasnt been touched in years !! With very strange pictures hanging around !!! The television also turned off every 20mins which was very annoying and a £10 deposit for the remote!!!
reviews.title: Happy new year

reviews.text: I stayed here with friends and union colleagues for five nights, during our union annual
reviews.title: Good Value, Good Service, Very Friendly

reviews.text: conferance during April of this year. We were welcomed on our arrival and given clear information. The rooms were clean and tidy and beds very comfortable and kept that way during our stay, meals ie breakfast were of very good quality. This hotel was excellant value for the money and inexpensive. My colleagues and I enjoyed our stay and would definitely recommend this hotel . Neil and Brian will make you feel at home
reviews.title: excellent value

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: all staff were exceptionally friendly, the room was clean, and the restaurant was excellent everything was spot on the food was amazing as was the service.
reviews.title: Great hotel enjoyed stay would book again

reviews.text: it was within walking distance of everything we needed. it was very mixed although we were there for the nightlife the hotel had famillies and older guests so it wasnt noisy at night
reviews.title: A friendly hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: the only thing we didnt like was the shower the shower curtain didnt really stop the floor from getting soaking wet
reviews.title: Excellence

description: Multi-award winning hotel from Blackpool Tourism Excellence Awards, and three stars awarded from VisitBritain. Now contains the new fine dining restaurant Cascades, including an eight foot water feature. Also contains The Vidella Cocktail Bar with extensive cocktail menu and range of spirits and liqueurs, plus plenty of chilled champagne for those special occasions. Ideally situated close enough to walk to the lively and vibrant centre, without being in the hustle and bustle of town.
